Pandas¶

fff

dtype - object - means Python object - meaning could be anything and thus difficult to work with. Pandas is working on string object.

loc vs iloc¶

  • loc - used for subsetting by reference - e.g. to column names, index (rowname)

  • iloc - used for subsetting by position

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.000 seconds)

Download Jupyter notebook: plot_pandas.ipynb
